name: VARIANCE
description: This table contains data on variance (IVR) records associated with a patient.

columns.name: VARIANCE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the variance record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user creating this record.

columns.name: USER_DISC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the discipline of the user creating this variance record.

columns.name: USER_DISC_TYPE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: CREATED_TIME
columns.description: The instant this variance record was created.

columns.name: CSN
columns.description: The patient contact serial number for this variance.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department associated with this variance.

columns.name: VARIANCE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the variance type associated with this record.

columns.name: VARIANCE_TYPE_ID_VARIANCE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the variance type record.

columns.name: VAR_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category assigned to this variance record.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the goal associated with this variance record.

columns.name: GOAL_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the goal type associated with this variance record.

columns.name: GOAL_TYPE_ID_GOAL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the goal type record.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the intervention associated with this variance record.

columns.name: INTRVNTN_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the intervention type associated with this variance record.

columns.name: INTRVNTN_TYPE_ID_INTRVNTN_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the intervention type.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name for this record.
